casebody.data:
Mary S. FAUPEL, Individually and as Trustee of Mary S. Faupel Revocable Trust, Plaintiff-Appellee,
v.
GIFFIN FINANCIAL PLANNING SERVICES, INC., Giffin Mortgage Company, Inc., Giffin Financial Group, Incorporated, DRG Investment Advisory Services, LLC, Marina Investors Group, Inc., and Giffin Management Group Inc., Defendants,
and
Diane K. Giffin, Individually, as Trustee of the David R. Giffin Trust and as Personal Representative of the Estate of David R. Giffin, Defendant-Appellant. SC: 157817 Supreme Court of Michigan. October 30, 2018

Order

On order of the Court, the application for leave to appeal the April 10, 2018 order of the Court of Appeals is considered, and it is DENIED, because we are not persuaded that the questions presented should now be reviewed by this Court.
